name: TicketForEvent
overview:
TicketForEvent is an online registration & e-ticketing service for event organisers. The service is created for different types of events: exhibitions, conferences, forums, workshops, seminars, corporate, cultural, entertainment and sport events.

It allows to register visitors and participants, sell tickets and promote events online! The service is easy to customize, to embed on any website, to create event affiliate network.

TicketForEvent is rapidly developed in the CIS countries market and provides best payment options choice for Eastern Europe countries and the CIS market. Since the service launch 1,000+ events used TicketForEvent to sell 100,000+ e-tickets in one year.

TicketForEvent was originally developed by ExpoPromo Group Ltd. – international company, offering a complex of online services for the world event industry. One of the most well-known of them is the ExpoPromoter affiliate network, which raised $ 1 mln. from Dekarta Capital in 2011. In 2012 TicketForEvent formed it’s own team on the basis on ExpoPromo Group’s one.

funding_rounds.source_description: TicketForEvent Raises $3M From New VC Abele Ventures To Take On Eventbrite and Cvent In Online Ticketing In Europe
